title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-2.4 - Use of State advisory appraisals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8195-2.4 - Use of State advisory appraisals

State Regulations
(a) The assessor shall report to ORPTS the
manner in which that advisory appraisal will be used in preparing an assessment
for the tentative assessment roll. The notification to ORPTS must be received
at least 45 days prior to the tentative assessment roll. (b) Forms. The notification of the manner in
which the advisory appraisal has been used shall be made on a form provided by
ORPTS. Communications pursuant to this Part may be transmitted by electronic
means if all parties so agree. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8195-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
